mapper.update:
update exam_subject
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER},
work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qualified_score = #{qualifiedScore,jdbcType=REAL},
total_score = #{totalScore,jdbcType=REAL},
exam_time = #{examTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
single_number = #{singleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
judgement_number = #{judgementNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
multiple_number = #{multipleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
judgement_score = #{judgementScore,jdbcType=REAL},
single_score = #{singleScore,jdbcType=REAL},
multiple_score = #{multipleScore,jdbcType=REAL},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exam_subject set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qualified_score = #{qualifiedScore,jdbcType=REAL}, total_score = #{totalScore,jdbcType=REAL}, exam_time = #{examTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, single_number = #{singleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, judgement_number = #{judgementNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, multiple_number = #{multipleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, judgement_score = #{judgementScore,jdbcType=REAL}, single_score = #{singleScore,jdbcType=REAL}, multiple_score = #{multipleScore,jdbcType=REAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.name as work_type_name, (SELECT count(1) FROM exam_subject_topic where subject_id = a.id) as topic_number FROM (SELECT a.*,b.name as industry_name FROM exam_subject as a LEFT JOIN sys_industry as b on a.industry =b.id WHERE a.industry = #{search.industryCategory} AND a.work_type = #{search.workTypeId} limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}) as a LEFT JOIN sys_work_type as b on a.work_type = b.id
select * From exam_subject as a where a.work_type = #{workType}
